To add a new word go to main page of application 

Enter the word you want to add(or translate) in the field with hint "Enter Word To Translate"

app will automatically detects word and translates it online

app shows its meaning to you

now you can add it to your library.

if you don't have Internet connection or you think the meaning is bad you can change or insert a new meaning and then insert it to your library

You can change translate language by clicking on the translate names on the top of main page, after that you can scroll to find your wanted language or simply enter the name of that in the "Filter" field to find it faster
its very simple , select your target board then insert the word you want :)

you cat do it in two ways:

	1.Click + button in main page then enter the name of board to insert

	2.from the left side menu select boards
click + button and enter name of board.
In main page you can see a list of words , find your target word then click \'three dot\' at the top-left then select move , after that you can select a board to move
In main page you cat see a list of words , find your target word then click \'three dot\' at the top-left so you can select each Remove or Edit options

In the setting page select Notification Cycle , so you can select delay between two notifications
In the setting page select Notification Cycle and set it to zero

Memorize limit in settings is a limit for correct count answers in quizzes that with that count you will make sure that you learned the word, so you can change it with the level of trust to yourself :)

At the left side menu you can see an option named Export , with that you can select words and move them in other boards then select a name for file , your backup file will be saved in /storage/notifictionary/YOUR_FILENAME.nfb

At the left side menu you can see an option named Import , with that you can select you backup file and see all words in that file and boards , before restore you can change words boards or deselect some of words

There are many reasons to use Import and Export: 

	1.First , when you want to delete application and install it late , you can save your words and their detail in a file and reuse them again after you install application

	2.You want to change your phone and you want to keep your data in new phone

	3.Your friend likes your words and want to have them , simply you can Export your words and give file to your friend and he(she) Import the file into his application

	4.You can make amazing boards for learning and maybe you could able to sell them!!

We avoided to use random selection for option of our Quizzes , so used Cosine algorithm to find similar words in your library and with top 10 of them making random Quizzes , with this we can make sure that Quizzes are better than random ones.
